lenders.name: Michael

lenders.name: Joe

lenders.occupational_info: I am a fellow entrepreneur who is actively pursuing my passion to help educate, empower and enrich the lives of the individuals and organizations we serve by providing interactive eductional materials related to personal finance, investing basics and related topics.

lenders.occupational_info: I work mostly on t.v. shows, loading film into the camera, changing lenses, moving equipment around etc.

lenders.name: David

lenders.occupational_info: I work in a multinational healthcare company, making sure our products exceed customer expectations, putting a smile on their faces.

lenders.name: Sarah

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I want a fairer world.

lenders.name: Eleanor

lenders.occupational_info: My work is to talk with a person about problems in life that are self generated and help the person make changes that better life.

lenders.name: Tim Clair
lenders.loan_because: To give someone help to get their lives on track...  Australian's love to help others my wife Mel and  my family love this concept and the way that Kiva go about distributing the funds.

Linked in - Tim Clair Skype: Tim_Clair
Structuring financial solutions for large projects requiring additional funding.  Please get in contact if you would like to know more timothyclair@hotmail.com

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: Its impolrtant to help others whom are not a fournate as ourselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the Asia Pacific, Middle East and Africa region for a large UK privately held business. Having travelled this region for the past 20 years I can understand the importance of helping others.

lenders.name: Wayne & Jake
lenders.loan_because:
I once found a quote that challenged me how to live...   "This is the true joy of life: being used up for a purpose recognized by yourself as a mighty one; being a force of nature instead of a feverish, selfish little clod of ailments and grievances, complaining that the world will not devote itself to making you happy. I am of the opinion that my life belongs to others, and as long as I live, it is my privilege to do for them whatever I can. I want to be thoroughly used up when I die, for the harder I work, the more I live…Life is no brief candle to me. It is a sort of splendid torch which I have got hold of for a moment, and I want to make it burn as brightly as possible before handing it on to future generations." 
- George Bernard Shaw
lenders.occupational_info: Wayne: I own a small insurance agency.  We sell policies that help individuals and business manage risk.  Jake: I am a student, violinist, baseball and soccer (football) player who also enjoys skiing and building with Legos

lenders.name: Cindy and Doug
lenders.loan_because: What a great way to help change the world - one life at a time.  It is wonderful to help others help themselves.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I think it's amazing  that I can help someone  achieve their dreams for a better life while I'm on my computer on the other side of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Manhattan for a Large Advertising agency.  I fix & correct  Digital Photographs on a Mac computer for magazine, Billboard & all sorts of in store advertising.

lenders.loan_because: a small amount for us can make a big difference for somebody !

lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from the US Army and now work for myself as an independent contractor creating websites

Cheers to Kiva and all the folks who make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the senior partner of a New York City law firm as both secretary and legal administrator.  I also do fund raising for NYC arts organizations and civic associations.

lenders.name: C&A
lenders.loan_because: We like to.

lenders.name: Christi
lenders.loan_because: One of my favorite bumper stickers is "If you want peace, work for justice".  I don't think poor people get much justice so this is how I try to help.

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: Lending through Kiva.org is a way to empower people throughout the world!  It gives them the tools that they need to make their part of the world better through the direct input from their own actions.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to help people understand the financial markets in our world using the latest technology

lenders.name: Max
lenders.occupational_info: Currently a Junior studying International Relations at Brown University, I will be a Kiva Fellow for the next 8 weeks volunteering for PEMCI in Malaba, Kenya. This includes posting video, writing, and photo journals about the entrepreneurs in the region. I'm ecstatic to document the lives of Kiva borrowers, and help to foster the amazing connections being made across the world.

lenders.name: Miriam
lenders.loan_because: Everyone wins. I don't loose any money in money investments and someone else in the world wins to reinvest in their family, business, and community. What a rare and wonderful opportunity. Thank you Kiva.

lenders.name: Nancy Matson
lenders.loan_because: A little bit of money from me can mean a lot to someone in the developing world.

lenders.loan_because: i got this as a  26th birthday gift and i think it is a great cause. good luck to all, my your dreams  in work come true!

lenders.occupational_info: Although retired I am still active in trying to assist entrepreneurs and innovators to succeed with their ideas and products.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I know a little will go a long way and it feels good to help someone out.

lenders.name: Heiko
lenders.loan_because:
I had a one-man business for some years. I did things that didn't need any start-up money because I would have never gotten a loan.
Now that I have a job I have a little extra money and I am happy that I can loan it directly to people to help them get their businesses started. And when it comes back it goes to the next person and therefore reaches more than one person.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach math at a Community College. I am also the coordinator of the math center where people can get help with their math homework.

lenders.occupational_info: I research law and certain subjects and summarize the evidence in a case to help the lawyer get ready for trial or settle a case.

lenders.name: Heather

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because:
Microlending seems like a wonderful way to share my good fortune, and I hope my small contributions will make a difference in people's lives. 

Please note: The loan to "identity protected" in Kirkuk, Iraq, was made by members of my Middle Eastern History class (Summer 2007) at the University of North Texas. After it was fully paid back, I rolled it over to Mohamad in Lebanon. After he fully paid back his loan, I  rolled it over to Mazouza in Palestine. After she fully repaid her loan, I rolled it over to  Rana, also in Palestine. She's now paid her loan back, so I rolled it over to Abdelkareem in Palestine.  I hope to keep this money active as long as possible for loans to assist Middle Easterners, in honor of my students who raised the money initially. :)

lenders.name: Sunny
lenders.loan_because: In this way, I can help entrepeneurs grow their businesses, support their families with dignity, and help their communities, to ultimately provide us all with a better place to live.
lenders.occupational_info: I review documents that describe mechanical devices as part of applications for US patents.  Patents allow inventors to protect their ideas for a period of 20 years.   Many inventors are small business people who are constantly working to improve their products.

lenders.name: Seánan
lenders.loan_because:
I can. 

It is a pleasure to be able to make a change in the world, and to do so as an individual. Kiva enables me to show other people that this is possible. (This is but one reason I shall never form or join a group.)

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: This was a gift from our brother (in-law), and we went to Africa on our honeymoon.  We want to share our blessings with others in a way that promotes hard work & growth.

lenders.name: Les
lenders.loan_because: Its a great way to help people develop a business and help themselves and their communities
lenders.occupational_info: Photographer

lenders.occupational_info: Judy is a retired inner city middle school math and science teacher ...now focused on grand-mothering.   Skip is a health care consutlant; and also teaches health economics & policy to MBA students.  Judy and Skip split their time between Olympia, Washington and San Francisco.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance.

lenders.name: Yael
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: My work is challenging, but I am continually grateful for the *privilege*.  I think that the value created by microfinance is greater than the value conveyed by compounded interest.

specialist )in Tucson, AZ.

lenders.loan_because: I feel responsible.

lenders.occupational_info: I have worked with people with AIDS for 20 years.  I have worked to close youth prisons in Louisiana and now I am working on raising 2 beautiful boys and supporting my spouse who is becoming a doctor.

lenders.name: sabino & marisa
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help others

lenders.name: Derrick

lenders.name: John

lenders.occupational_info: I am a consultant and I work to develop websites on the internet. I am also a dj and I mix all forms of music together.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people one-on-one. Not long along ago, on the news program "Democracy Now!", I heard author Eduardo Galeano quote an engineer friend of his. His friend pointed out that nothing gets built from the top down except a hole. Everything else must be built from the ground up.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the government of the State of Texas. We lease state property to companies so they can build solar farms, wind farms, and geothermal energy plants. We also help companies and local governments  switch their fleet vehicles from diesel to alternative fuels. And -- most exciting to me -- we co-host an annual forum for Mexico/US border states to share information and ideas about energy.

lenders.occupational_info:
Spock - http://www.spock.com - is developing a search engine that helps users find and discover people. With over one hundred million people already indexed and millions added everyday, Spock is building the broadest and deepest people specific search engine.

The team has extensive experience in search from leading companies including Friendster, Netscape, Yahoo, and Microsoft. Spock has received over $8 million in investments to date from Clearstone Venture Partners and Opus Capital Ventures.

lenders.name: Nestor
lenders.loan_because: I believe in Grameen Bank founded by Muhamud Yunus. I read his book and m daughter spent 6 weeks working with them in Bangladesh.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a medical doctor who specializes in severe mental disorders caused by biochemical imbalances and traumatic injuries to the brain. I also help people with nervous conditions caused by psychological traumas of childhood and adolescence. I use psychoanalytic, behavioral and systems theories as my guiding theoretical framework when doing psychotherapy and bio-neuro-pharmaco-medical science when there is a need to add medications.
